'''''The Inklings Coloring Book''''' is a [[2016]] [[Wikipedia:Coloring book#Adult coloring books|adult colouring book]] illustrated by [[James A. Owen]]. The illustrations are themed around the [[Inklings]].<ref name=Kent>{{webcite|author=|articleurl=http://www.kentstateuniversitypress.com/2015/the-inklings-coloring-book/|articlename=The Inklings Coloring Book|dated=|website=[http://www.kentstateuniversitypress.com/ kentstateuniversitypress.com]|accessed=18 April 2016}}</ref>
==From the publisher==

Creatively color the world of Oxford’s Inklings

Renowned fantasy illustrator James A. Owen presents fifteen intricate and imaginative line drawings inspired by the works of Oxford’s famous Inklings and Diana Glyer’s fascinating ''Bandersnatch''.

Printed on heavy stock on one side only, each drawing is suitable for markers, fine-tipped pens, and colored pencils. Color your way through [[The Eagle and Child]] pub, along the banks of the Isis, beneath the spires of [[University of Oxford#Magdalen College|Magdalen College]] — and find (and color!) the bandersnatch hidden in each picture.

Fans of the Inklings fantasy literature and lovers of coloring books for grown-ups will enjoy relaxing with ''The Inklings Coloring Book''.<ref name=Kent/>
